plot: Ali gets thrown out for coming home drunk one night by his father. He spends a night rough on the streets. The next morning he sees something that gives him the strength to come home and face his father.
title: Munãfiq
plot_es: Ali gets thrown out for coming home drunk one night by his father. He spends a night rough on the streets. The next morning he sees something that gives him the strength to come home and face his father.
